initial_greeting: Hey hey, finally someone who doesn't give a damn about politics at this party.
talked_already: Can't say I wanted to see you again.

start.text: Though, I can't say I'd want to spend my time talking to men on a night like this.

choices.text: Politics, Shmolitics. I'm really just here to get laid.

talked_previously.text: Any chance we can hurry up with this conversation?

choices.text: You're tellin me, I was hoping you'd help me get laid tonight.
How's your luck been so far with you know who?

starts_talk_as_bro.text: What's up my man. Just had a perfect view of the fox and the hare from over here.

talk_of_babes_begins.text: Glad to see someone finally noticed all the hot meat here. I was worried I would have to take all the ladies home with me tonight. Got any preferences?

gushing_over_the_hare.text: Haha! I knew I liked you. But I've got first take on her. I've been keeping my eyes on her. She's been with The Fox all night. Don't worry, once I win my prize, I'll let you have a turn.

preferred_any_other_woman.text: Heh, well they're somethin alright, but they don't hold a candle to The Hare. I'm just waiting for my chance alone with her, but she's been talking to The Fox all night. If they talk any longer I might just have to invite them both!

preferred_men.text: What? Wait, are you trying to come on to me? That's sick man, get out of here.

simplify_babe_talk.text: Ahh, yea, no luck yet. That damn Hare's been playin hard to get, any chance I get she goes running over to talk to The Fox. She's knows she can't resist me all night.

this_guy_doesnt_like_gay_men_because_of_.text: Nice try, I don't waste my time with people like you.
